command.label: Command
command.tooltip: The Command to get your Team.

delay.label: Duration of displayed gifs
delay.tooltip: The Name of Your Scene, where all your gifs are in SLOBS

scene.label: GIF Scene Name
scene.tooltip: The SLOBS Scene where you have your gifs

apiaddress.label: API Adress
apiaddress.tooltip: Usually you can leave this as is. If you select a different Adress in SLOBS or are running SLOBS and Chatbot on different machines you have to change this.

apiport.label: API Port
apiport.tooltip: Usually you can leave this as is. If you select a different port in SLOBS you have to change this.

token.label: SLOBS Auth token
token.tooltip: The Token from SLOBS Remote Control
